title: Cholestrol
content: LDL cholestrol levels are still at 100 mg/dL so needs to be controlled further with less intake of any kinds of fats

title: Water Retention
content: Fluid retention (oedema) seems to fluctauting so need to maintain water intake to 1 litre per day as advised before

title: Diabetes
content: Sugar levels seem well in control so continue diet restrictions as advised
